Text:
Average 1.3MB/s down! 

No sync problems here.

Thanks for this.

Very decent download speed.

There is nothing wrong with audio, I have no idea what Phil is talking about, I watched the whole thing with no sync problems or glitches.

Video quality is good, just as you'd expect from a DVD release.

So quality is a definite 10/10, it's exactly as you'd find on an English DVD with the default settings.

Movie is hilarious, it's got to be on my top three "Most Laughed In Of All Time". I peed a little at some points.
Don't know what the fuss is all about. Very fast download and very good quality. thanks for the up.

Thanks for the badass upload!

A: 10
V: 10

Excellent quality all around.  :)
Thanks heaps! Fast download. Excelent quality. Great movie.

My friend Hallak told me this movie is EPIC, downloaded it, A:10 V:10 M:10.
